  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      This is where the game is created

      This is where the game is created. The main menu frame is created here to start the game and from here the levels can be started.

    • startLevelFromSave

      public void startLevelFromSave​(GameLevel level)
      The method for starting game from a save file.

      The method for starting game from a save file. A level object with the right level details is passed in here and depending on the level we load the right backgrounds and music etc..

      Parameters:
      level - Level object that was created from reading from the save file.

    • startLevel1

      public void startLevel1()
      The method for starting level 1.

      The method for starting level 1. This method loads the correct image and music for level 1.

    • startLevel2

      public void startLevel2()
      The method for starting level 2.

      The method for starting level 2. This method loads the correct image and music for level 1.

    • startLevel3

      public void startLevel3()
      The method for starting level 3.

      The method for starting level 3. This method loads the correct image and music for level 3.

    • startLevel4

      public void startLevel4()
      The method for starting level 4.

      The method for starting level 4. This method loads the correct image and music for level 1.

    • goToNextLevel

      public void goToNextLevel()
      Method for progressing from one level to the next.

      Method for progressing from one level to the next. Also the score for the finished level is recorded for the high score leaderboards section.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Run the game.
